siteMetadata.title: Anthony Cho
siteMetadata.subtitle: CS '20 @ Rice. Incoming SWE @ Grand Rounds. Writing about my life and things that matter to me.

frontmatter.title: A Whole New World
frontmatter.description: I've been spending a lot of time watching youtube videos about photography and it's been actually very eye opening. What I love about picking up new hobbies is that often times I'll stumble into a whole new world and community of people united by some like minded passion, always a medium for human expression.

frontmatter.title: A Merry Christmas
frontmatter.description: Since my birthday (Dec 13) and christmas are so close to one another, I've recently been getting so much love from family, friends, and my so. And last week, as I was in the ER I distinctly remember my dad and sister waiting patiently next to my bed all night long.
